column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////Went in on a Saturday morning. Busy as expected but it was worth the 30 minute wait. (Although they said "around 15 minutes" when we asked initially.) The staff was super sweet
column2: the portions were HUGE and the food was tasty. The corned beef hash isn't recommended... it came out overcooked but still edible. The fig and bacon omelette however
column3: was DELICIOUS. I'd go back just for that... and their pancakes.
